long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to save your search filters on GitHub pull requests and issues pages to reuse them later.

To save a filter, just use it, then click on "Filters" on the left, then "Save this filter"
To use a saved filter, click on "Filters" on the left, you will see your saved filters as well as GitHub's default
